level.text: Determination of the amount of the reward shall be based on, but not limited to, the following considerations:
The nature of the defendant’s involvement in major firearm-trafficking;
The number of firearm-related cases closed with the arrest of the defendant;
Other firearm-related incidents in which the defendant is known or proved to have been involved;
The seriousness of the crime committed with a firearm;
Other serious criminal activity in which the defendant has been involved;
Quality of the information supplied by the citizen;
The willingness of the citizen to testify if needed;
Share to be awarded when information from more than one citizen is involved; and
Any other factor which the panel values as a benefit to the community as a result of the apprehension and indictment of the suspect.
